name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Business identifier for this product. Could be an MPID.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Business identifier for this product. Could be an MPID.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Business identifier for this product. Could be an MPID.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: Regulatory type, e.g. Investigational or Authorized.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Regulatory type, e.g. Investigational or Authorized.

name: $domain
desc: Returns: If this medicine applies to human or veterinary uses.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: If this medicine applies to human or veterinary uses.

name: $description
desc: Returns: General description of this product.

name: $combinedPharmaceuticalDoseForm
desc: Returns: The dose form for a single part product, or combined form of a multiple part product.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The dose form for a single part product, or combined form of a multiple part product.

name: $indication
desc: Returns: General combined description of indication(s) for this product. See also MedicinalProductDefinitionIndication.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: General combined description of indication(s) for this product. See also MedicinalProductDefinitionIndication.

name: $legalStatusOfSupply
desc: Returns: The legal status of supply of the medicinal product as classified by the regulator.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The legal status of supply of the medicinal product as classified by the regulator.

name: $additionalMonitoringIndicator
desc: Returns: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to additional monitoring for regulatory reasons.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to additional monitoring for regulatory reasons.

name: $specialMeasures
desc: Returns: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to special measures for regulatory reasons.

name: $addspecialMeasures
desc: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to special measures for regulatory reasons.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Whether the Medicinal Product is subject to special measures for regulatory reasons.

name: $paediatricUseIndicator
desc: Returns: If authorised for use in children.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: If authorised for use in children.

name: $productClassification
desc: Returns: Allows the product to be classified by various systems.

name: $addproductClassification
desc: Allows the product to be classified by various systems.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Allows the product to be classified by various systems.

name: $marketingStatus
desc: Returns: Marketing status of the medicinal product, in contrast to marketing authorizaton.

name: $addmarketingStatus
desc: Marketing status of the medicinal product, in contrast to marketing authorizaton.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Marketing status of the medicinal product, in contrast to marketing authorizaton.

name: $pharmaceuticalProduct
desc: Returns: Pharmaceutical aspects of product.

name: $addpharmaceuticalProduct
desc: Pharmaceutical aspects of product.

name: $packagedMedicinalProduct
desc: Returns: Package representation for the product.

name: $addpackagedMedicinalProduct
desc: Package representation for the product.

name: $ingredient
desc: Returns: The ingredients of this medicinal product - when not specified elsewhere. This is only needed if the ingredients are not specified by the pharmaceuticalProduct or packagedMedicinalProduct references above. In cases where those levels of detail are not used, the ingredients may be specified directly here.

name: $addingredient
desc: The ingredients of this medicinal product - when not specified elsewhere. This is only needed if the ingredients are not specified by the pharmaceuticalProduct or packagedMedicinalProduct references above. In cases where those levels of detail are not used, the ingredients may be specified directly here.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The ingredients of this medicinal product - when not specified elsewhere. This is only needed if the ingredients are not specified by the pharmaceuticalProduct or packagedMedicinalProduct references above. In cases where those levels of detail are not use

name: $attachedDocument
desc: Returns: Supporting documentation, typically for regulatory submission.

name: $addattachedDocument
desc: Supporting documentation, typically for regulatory submission.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Supporting documentation, typically for regulatory submission.

name: $masterFile
desc: Returns: A master file for to the medicinal product (e.g. Pharmacovigilance System Master File).

name: $addmasterFile
desc: A master file for to the medicinal product (e.g. Pharmacovigilance System Master File).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A master file for to the medicinal product (e.g. Pharmacovigilance System Master File).

name: $contact
desc: Returns: A product specific contact, person (in a role), or an organization.

name: $addcontact
desc: A product specific contact, person (in a role), or an organization.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A product specific contact, person (in a role), or an organization.

name: $clinicalTrial
desc: Returns: Clinical trials or studies that this product is involved in.

name: $addclinicalTrial
desc: Clinical trials or studies that this product is involved in.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Clinical trials or studies that this product is involved in.

name: $::name
desc: Returns: The product's name, including full name and possibly coded parts.

name: $addname
desc: The product's name, including full name and possibly coded parts.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The product's name, including full name and possibly coded parts.

name: $crossReference
desc: Returns: Reference to another product, e.g. for linking authorised to investigational product.

name: $addcrossReference
desc: Reference to another product, e.g. for linking authorised to investigational product.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Reference to another product, e.g. for linking authorised to investigational product.

name: $manufacturingBusinessOperation
desc: Returns: An operation applied to the product, for manufacturing or adminsitrative purpose.

name: $addmanufacturingBusinessOperation
desc: An operation applied to the product, for manufacturing or adminsitrative purpose.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An operation applied to the product, for manufacturing or adminsitrative purpose.
